publication.abstract: DNAPlotter is an interactive Java application for generating circular and linear representations of genomes. Making use of the Artemis libraries to provide a user-friendly method of loading in sequence files (EMBL, GenBank, GFF) as well as data from relational databases, it filters features of interest to display on separate user-definable tracks. It can be used to produce publication quality images for papers or web pages. Â© The Author 2008. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.
publication.title: DNAPlotter: Circular and linear interactive genome visualization

summary.description: DNAPlotter is a collaborative project between Jemboss and Artemis. It makes use of the existing circular plot in Jemboss and the Artemis sequence libraries.
summary.name: DNAPlotter
